headline: STERIS plc (STE) Remains in Focus as Analysts Reaffirm Confidence
summary: STERIS plc (NYSE:STE) is one of the best medical technology stocks to invest in. On February 5, Citizens reiterated its Market Outperform rating on STERIS plc (NYSE:STE) and kept the $280 price target on the shares. The firm made this move in reaction to STERIS’s Q3 FY2026 financial results. STERIS beat revenue expectations by about […]
